checks.name: Cache Efficiency
checks.description: Analyzes database-wide buffer cache hit ratio

checks.name: Connection Efficiency
checks.description: Analyzes PostgreSQL 14+ session statistics for connection pool efficiency

checks.name: Connection Health
checks.description: Monitors connection pool saturation, idle ratios, and stuck transactions

checks.name: Temporary Dev Indexes
checks.description: Identifies temporary development indexes that should be promoted or dropped

checks.name: Duplicate Indexes
checks.description: Identifies exact and prefix duplicate indexes wasting disk space

checks.name: Transaction ID Freeze Age
checks.description: Monitors transaction ID age to prevent wraparound issues

checks.name: Index Bloat
checks.description: Estimates B-tree index bloat to identify indexes needing maintenance

checks.name: Index Usage
checks.description: Identifies unused and inefficient indexes based on usage statistics

checks.name: Invalid Indexes
checks.description: Identifies indexes in invalid state that need rebuilding

checks.name: Table Partitioning
checks.description: Validates large and transient tables are properly partitioned

checks.name: Partition Key Usage
checks.description: Detects queries on partitioned tables that don't use partition keys

checks.name: PostgreSQL Version
checks.description: Checks if PostgreSQL version is supported and up to date

checks.name: Primary Key Type Validation
checks.description: Validates primary keys use bigint or UUID for sufficient growth capacity

checks.name: Replication Lag
checks.description: Monitors active replication streams for lag issues

checks.name: Replication Slots
checks.description: Validates replication slot configuration and health status

checks.name: Sequence Health
checks.description: Identifies sequences approaching exhaustion and integer columns needing bigint migration

checks.name: PostgreSQL Session Configs
checks.description: Validates role-level timeout and logging configurations

checks.name: Statistics Freshness
checks.description: Validates PostgreSQL statistics are mature enough for usage-based analysis

checks.name: Table Activity
checks.description: Analyzes table write activity to identify high-churn tables and HOT update efficiency issues

checks.name: Table Bloat
checks.description: Identifies tables with high dead tuple percentages indicating vacuum issues

checks.name: Table Sequential Scans
checks.description: Identifies tables with excessive sequential scans that may benefit from indexes

checks.name: Table Vacuum Health
checks.description: Monitors per-table autovacuum configuration and activity

checks.name: Temporary File Usage
checks.description: Monitors temporary file creation indicating work_mem exhaustion

checks.name: TOAST Storage Analysis
checks.description: Analyzes TOAST storage usage for large value storage optimization

checks.name: UUID Default Value Analysis
checks.description: Detects UUID columns using random UUIDs (v4) as defaults which cause B-tree index bloat

checks.name: UUID Type Validation
checks.description: Validates UUID columns use native uuid type instead of varchar/text

checks.name: PostgreSQL Vacuum & Maintenance Configs
checks.description: Validates autovacuum, maintenance memory, and vacuum cost settings
